channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:27 Plowing of anxiety in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Salt for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:27 Plowing of anxiety in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community. Salt for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:27 Plowing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:27 Plowing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
